id: Lots of Uniqlo Coats Are on Sale (Some for Up to 60 Percent Off)
paragraph: Now that it’s kind of cold and yet not the deep chill of January, we like the simplicity (and prices) of Uniqlo coats — they’re well-made, simple pieces that are pretty much built for transitional fall weather.
